I2C_LCD1602:
makecode I2C LCD1602 package for microbit.
From microbit/micropython Chinese community.
http://www.micropython.org.cn

Custom blocks
I2C_LCD1602.LcdInit: initial LCD, set I2C address. Address is 39/63 for PCF8574/PCF8574A
I2C_LCD1602.LcdInit|param|Addr: is i2c address for LCD, eg: 0, 39, 63. 0 is auto find address
I2C_LCD1602.ShowNumber: show a number in LCD at given position
I2C_LCD1602.ShowNumber|param|n: is number will be show, eg: 10, 100, 200
I2C_LCD1602.ShowString: show a string in LCD at given position
I2C_LCD1602.ShowString|param|s: is string will be show, eg: "Hello"
